meaningMnemonic:
If you <kanji>draw</kanji> an <kanji>image</kanji>, you end up with a <vocabulary>drawing</vocabulary> (or a <vocabulary>painting</vocabulary>).

描画 is a relatively formal word that refers to the process of creating pictures (rather than the pictures themselves). This includes not only painting or drawing but also digitally creating images on a computer screen.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
